short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shady Bears: Master the Shadow Challenge

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Shady Bears, where shadows become your greatest challenge! Master the art of shadow-dodging as you guide your cute bear through exciting levels, collecting acorns while avoiding your mischievous shadow clone. Shady Bears offers a unique multiplayer experience where two players can team up, making every session an thrilling adventure of strategy and quick reflexes. Grab some honey for bonus points, but watch out for those pesky bees!

- Tips
Single-player mode: Perfect for learning
2-Player mode: Cooperative shadow-dodging
Practice shadow-dodging techniques
Learn acorn collection strategies

- Tips
Move smoothly to outmaneuver shadows
Time your jumps carefully
Coordinate with your teammate
Watch your shadow's movements
